title: The Children of Light
description: What should a man who discovers by accident a secret project of the government which can affect the whole future of mankind? Should he be silent? Or should he communicate his knowledge to the public, even if it means risking his freedom, even his life?Simon Largwell is fleeing from the police. A young girl helps him escape and joins him. Both flee to a military exclusion zone. They hope that the mined area will deter their pursuers. But the dangers that lie behind the barbed wire are much greater than if they had just stepped on a mine. The terrible secret of the innocent, but deadly "Children of Light".Filmed by Hammer as "The Damned" directed by Joseph Losey. Starring Oliver Reed, Shirley Anne Field, MacDonald Carey, Viveca Lindfors, Alexander Knox.
author: H.L. Lawrence
